archimate:Node.name: ETL tool
archimate:Node.documentation: Een systeem dat het extraheren, transformeren en laden van gegevens in bulk ondersteunt.

properties.value: Talend Data Integration (http://www.talend.com/products/data-integration), Informatica PowerCenter (http://www.informatica.com/us/products/enterprise-data-integration/powercenter/), Oracle Data Integrator (http://www.oracle.com/us/products/middleware/data-integration/enterprise-edition/overview/index.html), IBM InfoSphere Information Server (http://www-01.ibm.com/software/data/integration/products.html)
